mapper.select: select * from member where mem_id=#{memId} and mem_status='Y'

select o.ord_no, o.ord_date, o.ord_pay, o.ord_review, a.act_no, a.act_title, i.img_name from orders o left outer join activity a on o.ord_refno = a.act_no left outer join image i on a.act_no = i.img_refno where o.ord_status='Y' and o.mem_id=#{memId} and o.ord_refcode=0 and i.img_level=0 and i.img_refcode=1 order by o.ord_no desc

select o.ord_no, o.ord_date, o.ord_pay, o.ord_review, p.pro_no, p.pro_title, i.img_name from orders o left outer join product p on o.ord_refno = p.pro_no left outer join image i on p.pro_no = i.img_refno where o.ord_status='Y' and o.mem_id=#{memId} and o.ord_refcode=1 and i.img_level=0 and i.img_refcode=2 order by o.ord_no desc

select o.ord_no, o.ord_count, o.ord_date, o.ord_name, o.ord_phone, o.ord_postcode, o.ord_basicaddr, o.ord_detailaddr, o.ord_request, o.ord_pay, o.ord_pay_way, o.ord_status, a.act_no, a.mem_id as act_id, a.act_startday, a.act_endday, a.act_place, a.act_title, a.act_price, a.act_status, m.mem_no, m.mem_nickname from orders o left outer join activity a on o.ord_refno = a.act_no left outer join member m on a.mem_id = m.mem_id where o.ord_status='Y' and o.ord_no=#{ordNo} and o.ord_refcode=0 order by o.ord_no desc

select o.ord_no, o.ord_count, o.ord_date, o.ord_name, o.ord_phone, o.ord_postcode, o.ord_basicaddr, o.ord_detailaddr, o.ord_request, o.ord_pay, o.ord_pay_way, o.ord_status, p.pro_no, p.mem_id as pro_id, p.pro_charge, p.pro_title, p.pro_price, p.pro_status, m.mem_no, m.mem_nickname from orders o left outer join product p on o.ord_refno = p.pro_no left outer join member m on p.mem_id = m.mem_id where o.ord_status ='Y'and o.ord_no=#{ordNo} and o.ord_refcode=1 order by o.ord_no desc
select img_name, img_status from (select * from image where img_level=0 and img_refcode=0 and img_refno=#{memNo} order by img_no desc) where rownum=1
mapper.insert: insert into review (REV_NO, MEM_ID, REV_RATING, REV_LAST_RATING, REV_CONTENT, REV_DATE, REV_STATUS, REV_REFCODE, REV_REFNO, ORD_NO) VALUES (seq_revid.nextval, #{memId}, #{revRating}, #{revRating}, #{revContent}, sysdate, default, #{revRefcode}, #{revRefno}, #{ordNo})
mapper.select: select f.fav_no, f.mem_id, f.fav_date, a.act_no, a.act_title, i.img_name, o.ord_pay from favorite f left outer join activity a on f.fav_refno = a.act_no left outer join image i on a.act_no = i.img_refno left outer join orders o on i.img_refno = o.ord_refno where f.fav_status='Y' and f.mem_id=#{memId} and f.fav_refcode=1 and i.img_level=0 and i.img_refcode=1 and o.ord_refcode=0 and o.mem_id=#{memId} order by f.fav_no desc

select f.fav_no, f.mem_id, f.fav_date, p.pro_no, p.pro_title, i.img_name, o.ord_pay from favorite f left outer join product p on f.fav_refno = p.pro_no left outer join image i on p.pro_no = i.img_refno left outer join orders o on i.img_refno = o.ord_refno where f.fav_status='Y' and f.mem_id=#{memId} and f.fav_refcode=2 and i.img_level=0 and i.img_refcode=2 and o.ord_refcode=1 and o.mem_id=#{memId} order by f.fav_no desc

select fs.fav_no, fs.fav_refno, m.mem_no, m.mem_id, m.mem_nickname, i.img_no, i.img_name, i.img_refno from(select * from favorite where fav_refcode = 0 and mem_id = #{memId} and fav_status = 'Y' and fav_refcode = 0) fs left outer join member m on m.mem_no = fs.fav_refno left outer join (select * from image where img_refcode = 0) i on m.mem_no = i.img_refno order by fs.fav_no desc

select ra.rev_no, ra.mem_id, ra.rev_rating, ra.rev_content, ra.rev_date, a.act_no, a.act_title, i.img_name from(select * from review where rev_status='Y' and mem_id=#{memId} and rev_refcode=0) ra left outer join activity a on ra.rev_refno = a.act_no left outer join (select * from image where img_refcode = 3 and img_level=0) i on ra.rev_no = i.img_refno order by ra.rev_no desc

select ra.rev_no, ra.mem_id, ra.rev_rating, ra.rev_content, ra.rev_date, p.pro_no, p.pro_title, i.img_name from(select * from review where rev_status='Y' and mem_id=#{memId} and rev_refcode=1) ra left outer join product p on ra.rev_refno = p.pro_no left outer join (select * from image where img_refcode = 3 and img_level=0) i on ra.rev_no = i.img_refno order by ra.rev_no desc

select r.rev_no, r.mem_id, r.rev_rating, r.rev_content, r.rev_date, r.rev_refcode, r.rev_refno, r.ord_no, r.rev_last_rating, a.act_no, a.act_title from review r left outer join activity a on r.rev_refno = a.act_no where r.rev_no=#{revNo}

select r.rev_no, r.mem_id, r.rev_rating, r.rev_content, r.rev_date, r.rev_refcode, r.rev_refno, r.ord_no, r.rev_last_rating, p.pro_no, p.pro_title from review r left outer join product p on r.rev_refno = p.pro_no where r.rev_no=#{revNo}
select img_name, img_level from image where img_refcode=3 and img_refno=#{revNo} order by img_level asc
